front.title: Using the International Mobile station Equipment Identity(IMEI)URN as an Instance ID

abstract.t: This specification defines how the Uniform Resource Name namespace reserved for GSMA (Global Sstandard for Mobiles Association) identities and its sub namespace for the IMEI (International Mobile station Equipment Identity) can be used as an instance-id as specified in RFC 5626 [1] and also as used by RFC 5627 [2].
